bill_title: to remove certain restrictions pertaining to the hunting of coyotes by nonresidents.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to remove certain restrictions pertaining to the hunting of coyotes by nonresidents. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 41-8-22 be amended to read as follows: 41-8-22. It is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any person possessing a nonresident predator license to take, trap or kill any fur-bearing animal, except that fox, coyote, and skunk may be taken by shooting or through the use of one or more dogs, the provisions of § 41-8-31 notwithstanding . 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
